author: Bloomberg
title: Virus hit Oyo puts Son's $2 bn guarantee at risk
description: Virus hit Oyo puts Son's $2 bn guarantee at riskToday, Oyo is freezing operations around the world and furloughing thousands of employees as it struggles to survive the coronavirus pandemic. Travel has slammed to a halt, leaving hotel rooms empty and losses r…
content: By Saritha Rai, Pavel Alpeyev and Takahiko HyugaJust nine months ago, Masayoshi Son publicly declared Ritesh Agarwal one of the star entrepreneurs backed by his SoftBank Group Corp. The Japanese billionaire boasted that Agarwal’s Oyo Hotels & Homes was po… [+5858 chars]
